intro: Psychotria vaginans, commonly known as the "vagina plant" or "false arrowhead," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of the Americas, particularly Central and South America. The plant is characterized by its striking violet or purple flowers and heart-shaped leaves. It often grows in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests. Psychotria vaginans is also known for its use in traditional medicine and its presence in the flora of the Amazon basin.
